trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ashland
There were no other sightings in Ashland on or around July 4th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the night of July 4th 2011, my fianc'e and I were in our front yard watching the local neighborhood fireworks when my fianc'e noticed something odd in the sky, I looked and saw what she was referring to as I had seen this exact light years before. I knew it was a ufo, from memory and feeling, I was excited, my fianc'e could only stare in amazement as she had always wanted to see something like it. We knew instantly that it was no firework as it moved horizontally, emitted a faint hum and stayed in place after a time as though observing the neighborhood well above the treeline. I then told my fianc'e to run and get our camera so we could document it. In the time it took her to run and get our camera, the first light disappeared from sight once it ascended vertically. As she came back out of our house with our camera, another light identically in all ways, (Movement, appearance and sound) appeared and she took 4 images of the light. It then ascended vertically and disappeared just as the first had.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
